questions.question: What is the dominant color of the supplement bottle's body?
What is the primary material of the container holding the supplement?
What is the shape of the supplement container, disregarding the cap?
What color is the clearly visible text on the supplement bottle's label?
What is the overall shape of the supplement container's lid or cap?
What color is the cap on top of the supplement container?
Describing the texture of the supplement bottle's surface, is it shiny or matte?
What is the general appearance of the label's design, is it simple or complex?
Considering the label, is the supplement's name prominently displayed?
What type of information, besides the product name, is displayed on the label?
What is the apparent size of the supplement bottle relative to a human hand?
What is the overall style of the supplement label design, is it modern or vintage?
What is the color of the smaller text or details printed on the label?
What is the general orientation of the text on the supplement bottle's label?
Does the bottle's label contain any visible icons or symbols aside from text?
